title: Bug 101187: Localization key validation error when adding
description: Description: When adding a localization key, if the key is left blank, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.
OB: The localization key is left blank in the properties file, but it still has a valid value.
EB: Expected result: The externalized text should be displayed in the chart title.
SR: Steps to reproduce: 1. Open the properties file. 2. Leave the localization key blank. 3. Save the file and try to display the chart.
